name: 捜査官の試練INVESTIGATOR TRIALS
description:
"INVESTIGATOR TRIALS" is a horizontal 2D shooting game independently produced by Green Tea Games (actually just two people).
Disclaimer: All characters appearing in this game are over 18 years old.

In the game, you will play the role of an intern examiner and participate in a trial to become an official examiner. Strive to defeat one mechanical guard after another and powerful enemies through trial and error, in order to unleash one's true strength and transform into various combat postures. After all, in the world of censorship, the Eurosceptics are justice, and the Eurosceptics are power.So strive to become a qualified inspector and open fire!

◆Rich skin

As the battles in the game continue to advance, players can continuously unlock new combat costumes and deeply experience the continuous growth from A Cup to G Cup, which will help you better understand the world of inspectors.

◆Rich firearms

In battle, players not only need to avoid bullets flying from all directions, but also learn to use their firearms to counterattack. Different firearms naturally correspond to different bullets and attack methods. Even if you're not good at shooting, it doesn't matter! Because defeating monsters will drop various drugs, after all, taking drugs is also a discipline that allows beginners and players of the ashes to enjoy the fun of the game happily!

◆Rich Monsters

The ultimate goal of the game is for players to defeat various bosses, which will no longer be just a test for novice inspectors, but also an experiment for organizing research on the latest biological machinery. So let's take a look at all the latest achievements in biological machinery.

◆Game Features

360 ° free shooting
Multiple combat forms
Support custom buttons
Exquisite vertical painting
Dance Crossdressing - Victory Dance
